forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered thunderstorms this morning, then windy during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms this morning, then windy during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms likely. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms likely. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 13C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 57F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 8C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 48F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 57F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low near 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph, becoming NNE and decreasing to less than 5 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High around 60F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 48F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 57F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 48F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High near 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 61F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 48F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. High 16C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 63F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 49F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 18C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 66F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low near 50F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 64F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 48F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.
